title: How to Create SEO Location Pages For Your Website (That Actually RANK!)
description:
Learn how to create SEO location pages that actually rank for local SEO!
📚Join our FREE Skool community for quick wins & expert SEO tips to help you rank faster and actually see results: https://www.skool.com/bka-seo-academy-4104
🚀Business owners: want better rankings without doing the work? Check out our DFY services: https://bkacontent.com/

Want your local business to show up when people search for services in your area? Then you need properly optimized location pages for SEO— not just a generic “contact us” page. 

In this video, I’ll walk you through how to create a high-performing location page that actually ranks in Google. You’ll learn:
- How to do Keyword Research for SEO location pages
- What makes a great local SEO page structure
- How to write content that targets your city or service area naturally
- The key on-page elements Google looks for in a geo-location page
- The BEST way to create SEO  location page FAQs that AI search tools love
- Common mistakes to avoid that kil
